text: Kuni no Tokotachi is a prominent god in shinto. He emerged from a reed Yoshida Kanetomo, who created the Yoshida Shinto sect, said that Kuninotokotachi was the same as Ame-no-Minakanushi and thought that he was the first and most important god of the Universe. == Sources == == Other websites == * Encyclopedia of Shinto * Kunitokotachi on the Japanese History Database Category:Gods and goddesses of Japan
title: Kuni-no-Tokotachi
